<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Telepathy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1719)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 363 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Gruhastha](/Deities.aspx?ID=346), [Nin](/Deities.aspx?ID=353), [The Readied Strike](/Deities.aspx?ID=371)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet. Once you establish a connection by communicating with a creature, the communication is two-way. You can communicate with only creatures that share a language with you.

---
**Heightened (6th)** You can communicate telepathically with creatures using shared mental imagery even if you don't share a language; _telepathy_ loses the [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) trait.
